DOC.brief_summary: The objective prospective , randomize , control multicenter trial , compare recurrent-restenosis rate balloon expandable VISIO-PRO stent arm selfexpandable PROTEGE GPS stent arm 12 month treatment stenosis occlusion common external iliac artery disease .
DOC.brief_title: Iliac , Common External ( ICE ) Artery Stent Trial
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age > 21 year . 2 . Patient must sign informed consent form . 3 . Patient must agree participate study comply followup requirement . 4 . Clinically , patient must Rutherford category 1 4 . Angiographic 5 . Planned stenting ( degree stenosis 70100 % ) within common external iliac artery . The target lesion must extend beyond iliac artery . 6 . Lesion segment start aortic bifurcation end take common femoral artery ( Offset iliac circumflex artery beneath ligamentum inguinale ) . 7 . The length lesion least 1 cm maximally 20 cm ( measurement radiopaque ruler ) . 8 . The degree target lesion stenosis must determine preinterventional duplex ultrasound ( MR ) angiography . 9 . Patency ipsilateral profunda artery . Ipsi contralateral artery lesion leg treat prior treatment study lesion . 10 . In case two stenotic region within segment , consider separate lesion nonstenotic mildly stenotic ( < 30 % ) segment least 2 cm length . Otherwise , consider single lesion . In case separate lesion , proximal lesion take target lesion ! 11 . A tandem lesion treat one stent consider one lesion . 1 . Patient currently participate another clinical trial 2 . Pregnancy pregnancy plan study duration 3 . Life expectancy le 2 year 4 . Comorbidities prevent study participation 5 . Severe coagulation disorder 6 . Current treatment anticoagulant aspirin , ticlopidine , clopidogrel prasugrel . 7 . Active gastric ulcer gastrointestinal bleeding 8 . Thrombotic occlusion target vessel within previous 4 week . 9 . Treatment target lesion laser atherectomy device . 10 . Dialysis dependency . 11 . Manifest hyperthyreosis . 12 . Known allergy contrast agent adequately control usual premedication . 13 . Known heparin intolerance . 14 . Known paclitaxel intolerance . Angiographic : 15 . Target lesion extends femoral artery . 16 . Symptomatic untreated inflow lesion > 70 % ipsilateral iliac artery . Pretreatment iliac stenosis possible . 17 . Target Lesion aortic bifurcation need treatment `` kissing balloon technique '' 18 . Lesion abdominal aorta need treatment .
DOC.keyword: Common Iliac Artery External Iliac Artery
